children.name: quote
children.label: Quote
children.default: “An authentic conversation has the power to start a relationship that results in trust, loyalty, and happy customers.”

children.name: sub_content
children.label: Sub content
children.default:
Together with the ongoing support of Charles' customer success team, SNOCKS was quickly able to prove why WhatsApp is considered to be the sales, service and marketing channel of the future. After a smooth onboarding process and structured agent training, the exit-intent opt-in Flow was established and quickly proved the value of WhatsApp.
Opening and conversion rates of SNOCKS’ newsletters jumped by almost 150% compared to Email already for the first campaigns and customers loved the frictionless interaction of website and chat apps.

name: press_text
label: Press Text
default: Backed, verbally, by the most influential tech magazines and marketing newschannels.

name: testimonial_1
label: Testimonial 1
default: "One of the hottest startups in Berlin."

name: testimonial_2
label: Testimonial 2
default: "A B2B startup transforming messaging apps into a revenue channel."

name: funding_text
label: Funding Text
default: In a Series A funding round led by Salesforce Ventures and other investors Accel and HV Capital, charles has secured the right funding and strategic partners to push this new technology to the market.

name: company_text
label: Company Text
default: Empowering brands to leverage end-to-end relationships with their consumers using the power of conversational commerce.
